original_title: 女ヒエラルキー底辺少女
overview: Momoko is a student at a high school. She's viewed as being stupid and sits at the bottom of her school's hierarchy. While her friends are asked out on dates and they have good times with their boyfriends, Momoko doesn't have a boyfriend. Momoko relieves her stress by dreaming of taking revenge upon those who look down upon her.
title: Hierarchy of Girls: A Girl at the Bottom
